company.name: Nova Gardens Limited
company.tagline: Cultivating the Future of Organic Productivity

about.description: Biovitam is an organic biofertilizer approved by KEPHIS (Kenya Plant Health Inspectorate Service) and engineered for maximum efficiency. Nova Gardens Limited is the sole distributor of Biovitam Biofertilizers in Kenya.
about.mission: Provide affordable, high-quality organic biofertilizers that enhance productivity while protecting soil health.
about.vision: To be Kenya's leading producer of certified organic biofertilizers, driving sustainable agricultural innovation.
objectives: Enhance quick recovery from all crop stresses.
Promote foliage growth, massive flowering, and zero abortions.
Improve flower and fruit retention and rapid fruit expansions.
Strengthen resistance against fungal, bacterial, and viral diseases.
Support heat, frost, and water stress management.
Enhance fruit taste and ensures quick, uniform ripening.

qualityAssurance.standards: Our organic fertilizers are produced under the most rigorous standards ensuring consistent purity and efficacy.
qualityAssurance.batchControl: Every batch is manufactured according to stringent protocols, guaranteeing a contaminant-free, high-quality product for our customers.
qualityAssurance.production: Through a controlled and standardized production process, we transform raw organic matter into a stable, nutrient-rich fertilizer, consistently batch after batch.
qualityAssurance.safety: We ensure our products are safe for crops, soil, and the environment, adhering to all relevant regulations.
qualityAssurance.agronomy: Our high-efficacy organic fertilizers are complemented by the direct, practical support of our agronomists and extension officers across the country ensuring our partners achieve optimal results.

products.name: All Growth
products.description: Balanced nutrition for vegetative growth and general health. Formulated for all-round plant development.
benefits: Balanced nutrient content for all growth stages
Enhances foliage growth and massive flowering
products.usage: Apply 2-3 tons per hectare during soil preparation. Side-dress monthly during growing season.

products.name: Strong Plant
products.description: Fortifies stems and roots for robust, resilient plants. High nitrogen content for maximum biomass.
benefits: Maximizes leaf surface area for photosynthesis
Reduces rejection rates in export crops
products.usage: Apply 2.5-3.5 tons per hectare. Best used during early growth and recovery phases.

products.name: Bloom Booster
products.description: Maximizes flowering and fruiting for higher market value. Targets reproductive hormones for heavy yields.
benefits: Stimulates heavy flowering and fruit set
Ensures uniform ripening and superior taste
products.usage: Apply during flowering and fruit development at 1.5-2 tons per hectare.

products.name: Calcium Nitrate
products.description: Enhances cell wall strength and nutrient balance. Essential for preventing diseases like blossom end rot.
benefits: Strengthens cell walls for better shelf life
Prevents physiological disorders (e.g., Blossom End Rot)
Improves calcium uptake in acidic soils
products.usage: Apply 1-1.5 tons per hectare as a supplement during peak growth.

clientele.name: Highland Flower Farms
clientele.feedback: The stem strength and color intensity of our roses have improved drastically. Our export rejection rate fell to nearly zero.

clientele.name: Kiambu Coffee Estate
clientele.feedback: Since switching to Biovitam, we've seen a consistent yield increase of 30kg per tree on our coffee blocks.

clientele.name: Rift Valley Horticulture
clientele.feedback: Reducing the flush period by 10 days allowed us to hit market windows we previously missed. It's a game changer.

clientele.name: Central Highlands Orchards
clientele.feedback: The fruit size and sweetness (Brix levels) are noticeably better. Our buyers have increased their orders this season.

processSteps.title: Raw Organic Source
processSteps.description: We begin with premium organic matter, ethically sourced from agricultural partners. All materials undergo initial screening for purity and absence of chemical pollutants.
processSteps.technical: Material moisture content stabilized at 45% before processing.

processSteps.title: Anaerobic Fermentation
processSteps.description: Our core process involves a multi-stage bio-fermentation cycle. This ensures the breakdown of complex organic molecules into bio-available nutrients.
processSteps.technical: Controlled temperature cycles between 55°C and 65°C to eliminate pathogens.

processSteps.title: Mineral Fortification
processSteps.description: During the final stages of fermentation, we precisely blend essential minerals and trace elements according to our proprietary NPK formulations.
processSteps.technical: Precision homogenization ensuring uniform nutrient distribution across all batches.

processSteps.title: Beneficial Microbes
processSteps.description: We infuse each batch with dormant beneficial microbial strains that rejuvenate the soil microbiome upon application.
processSteps.technical: Spores are stabilized for long shelf life in various storage conditions.

processSteps.title: Quality Matrix
processSteps.description: The final product undergoes rigorous lab analysis to verify nutrient concentration, moisture content, and absence of heavy metals.
processSteps.technical: Compliance with KEPHIS and international organic standards verified for every batch.

intro.title: Unlock Your Soil's Full Potential
intro.description: Our advanced formula does more than just feed the plant. It reactivates the soil microbiome, creating a self-sustaining ecosystem for long-term productivity.

benefits.title: Increased Crop Yields
benefits.description: Farmers using Biovitam report significant improvements in crop productivity and quality.

benefits.title: Enhanced Soil Health
benefits.description: Our biofertilizers improve soil structure, fertility, and microbial diversity.

benefits.title: Cost Efficiency
benefits.description: Reduce dependency on synthetic fertilizers while improving long-term soil sustainability.

benefits.title: Environmental Benefits
benefits.description: Contribute to sustainable agriculture and reduce your farm's carbon footprint.

traditional: Declining soil fertility and structure degradation
Lower crop quality and inconsistent yields
High water usage and chemical runoff
Increased susceptibility to pests and diseases
biovitam: Restored soil microbiome and organic matter
20-30% higher yields with premium market value
Better water retention and drought resistance
Stronger, resilient plants naturally fighting disease

scienceTestimonials.quote: Biovitam transformed our flower farm. Our yields increased by 25% and we're now fully certified organic.
scienceTestimonials.author: James Kipchoge

scienceTestimonials.quote: The soil quality improvement was noticeable within 6 months. Our water consumption is down, but yields are up!
scienceTestimonials.author: Maria Santos

scienceTestimonials.quote: Switching to Biovitam biofertilizers was the best decision for our family farm. Sustainable and profitable.
scienceTestimonials.author: Peter Ochieng

certificationsPage.intro: We adhere to the strictest international standards for organic agriculture. Our products are rigorously tested and certified safe for the environment and consumers.

accreditations.subtitle: Kenya Plant Health Inspectorate Service
accreditations.description: Fully registered and approved for distribution in Kenya, meeting all phyto-sanitary requirements for safety and efficacy.

accreditations.description: Formulated in accordance with international organic farming regulations, suitable for use in organic crop production.
